title: DevOps Platform Powerful. Simple.
author: Onedev Io
text: OneDev is by far the best tool I’ve used in my career as a software engineer. It allows my team and me to easily keep track of tasks and code, create in-depth reusable pipelines for our CI/CD, enforce (optional) role-based branch protection, provide highly-detailed code reviews for pull requests. And that’s just to name a few things. Huge thanks for creating something so awesome!Joshua Norman, Hassem Prag.
excerpt: Git server with kanban, CI/CD, and packages. Seamless integration. Unparalleled experience.
